input: The editor called the construction worker because he knew the whole story .
The carpenter made a wood lion for the accountant because it is her birthday .
The supervisor yelled at the cashier because she liked to pick her nose .
The guard asked the librarian to leave because it was late and she looked really tired .
The construction worker stared at the teacher because he was angry .
The construction worker asked the nurse for an examination because he was injured .
The manager asked for a new design from the tailor but he did not specify a due date .
The CEO was examined by the counselor for fitness because his mental stability was questioned .
The construction worker prayed for the tailor because he was faithful .
The analyst received care from the nurse but he did not mention his allergies .
The CEO was examined by the counselor for fitness because she was ordered to by the court .
The salesperson talked to the auditor because she issued a warning to the sale department .
The chief told the counselor that he took the day off .
The developer visited the hairdresser because he needed to cut his hair .
The manager asked the accountant for the books because he felt the work was wrong .
The receptionist welcomed the lawyer because this is part of her job .
The CEO hired the editor because he fired the last one .
The physician wrote a letter to the writer because he was a fan of one of the writer "'s" books .
The librarian helped the CEO to find the book because it is her job .
The salesperson sold some books to the librarian because it was his job .
The receptionist welcomed the lawyer because it is his first day to work .
The construction worker asked the hairdresser to cut his sideburns before anything else .
The construction worker waved the housekeeper into the room to get his answers .
The construction worker asked the attendant to not lose his car .
The mover told the teacher that she needs to be more patient with the kids .
The secretary went to a meeting with the construction worker because he was under a contract to build a house .
The CEO gave the cashier cash because he wanted to pay for his goods .
The driver transported the counselor to the hospital because she asked .
When the supervisor splashed the editor  he got in trouble .
The mechanic gave the clerk a present because it was her birthday .
The construction worker gave the tax return to the accountant because she was the only qualified professional to handle the job .
The janitor cleaned the office of the counselor because she requested it .
The CEO gave the cashier cash because she wanted to get her money .
The farmer needed to take a test from the counselor to appease to her .
When the supervisor splashed the editor  she fought back .
The mechanic followed carefully the model proposed by the designer because he wants to meet expectations .
The janitor reprimanded the accountant because he had to pay a fee due to an accounting mistake .
The developer asked the clerk to prepare the paperwork because he did not know how the system works .
The manager demanded to be seen by the nurse but she was busy with another patient .
The construction worker waved the housekeeper into the room to ask her a question .
The physician owed the cashier money because he did not pay the vodka .
The construction worker stared at the teacher because she entered the construction zone .
The mechanic fixed the housekeeper "'s" car and then she wrote a thankful note .
The construction worker scheduled an appointment with the counselor because she offered great advice .
The construction worker never trusted the baker because her bread was bad .
The laborer handed the secretary a hammer because she asked for a tool .
